name: G_plan Validation Benchmark
description: Plan generation and validation using the G_plan taxonomy. Supports deterministic (PlanGenerator), single-shot LLM (LLMPlanGenerator), classify-then-plan, and full 4-step decomposed pipeline.

g_plan.description: Load a workflow plan from catalog and validate at configured rigor level

g_plan_llm.description: Generate a workflow plan via LLM and validate at configured rigor level (single-shot)

g_analysis.description: Classify the problem type, language, severity, and key signals from the problem statement

g_plan_conditioned.description: Generate a workflow plan conditioned on the problem analysis (classify-then-plan pipeline)

g_recon.description: Extract actionable context: mentioned files, stack traces, APIs, test references, reproduction steps

g_strategy.description: Select a resolution strategy (S1-S5) based on problem analysis and codebase reconnaissance

g_plan_full.description: Generate a workflow plan conditioned on analysis, recon, and strategy (full decomposed pipeline)
